dscr: For 1-2 servings, with pork belly, marinated sliced pork, bacon, marinated chicken, crab stick, mixed meatball, fish tofu, fresh vegetables, green egg noodles, instant noodles, egg tofu, soup, sukiyaki dipping sauce, seafood dipping sauce and grass noodles

For 2-3 servings, with pork belly, marinated sliced pork, bacon, marinated chicken, crab stick, mixed meatball, fish tofu, shrimp, squid, fresh vegetables, green egg noodles, instant noodles, egg tofu, soup, sukiyaki dipping sauce, seafood dipping sauce and grass noodles
